CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT( EBH_DealFormat__c )="Primary", TEXT( EBH_DealFormat__c ) & TEXT(EBH_Vertical__c) & TEXT( EBH_DealStartDate__c ), TEXT( EBH_DealFormat__c ) & TEXT(EBH_Vertical__c) & TEXT( EBH_DealStartDate__c - CASE( MOD( EBH_DealStartDate__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, 6, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3, 2, 4, 3, 5, 4, 6, 5,0)))
CustomField.label: UID
